South Island weather: Heavy snow, rain watches for Otago, Southland - MetService https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/south-island-weather-heavy-snow-rain-watches-for-otago-southland-metservice/QIGJVYLIIBCLNMKJDI3CDCV5JE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/south-island-weather-heavy-snow-rain-watches-for-otago-southland-metservice/QIGJVYLIIBCLNMKJDI3CDCV5JE/ Cherie HowieA large swathe of the lower South Island is in the firing line. Sat, 27 Jul 2024 01:19:13 +0000 Snow lovers - like this happy pair pictured on Central Otago's Crown Range last winter - will no doubt be saying "Yippee" with a heavy dumping expected for parts of the lower South Island from Monday. But weather experts are also reminding people to take care, with lighter snowfalls and heavy rain also forecast in other areas. Photo / George Heard
